segments.text: I really want to go to China for vacation , but I can ’ t find a cheap plane ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not yet . Can you find a good price there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow , you really live in the Stone Age , Mom .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you don ’ t have to be mean . How do I do it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go to yahoo.com and click on “ Travel ” and “ Tickets . ” They ’ ll be about a billion sites to look at .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: O . K . Thanks . I ’ ll let you know what I find .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll look for a ticket for you , too .
segments.speaker: S1
